item.description:
Hello Investors,

2013 is going to be a great year and we want to start the year off right!

We'll be inviting a successful local real estate investors Alex and Kathy Schuck to speak about their investing experience (the good, the bad and the ugly!)

All the while you can network with other investors and real estate professionals in the Boston area.

More details to come!

6:00pm - Networking
6:30pm - Intro, Buy/Sell Deal Sharing and Speed Networking
6:45pm - Special guest speakers Alex and Kathy Schuck
7:15pm - Q&A
7:30pm - More networking!
8:00pm - Evening officially ends
item.name: 2013 Kickoff Meeting... presentation by North Shore Real Estate Solutions
